title: Current Poetry Torrents - July, 2013

Or go to the ebooks category of tpb where you can directly download it. NOTE THAT IN FUTURE ALL OF THIS UPLOADERS SPOKEN WORD TORRENTS WILL BE IN THE EBOOK CATEGORY)  Herewith - 


   Do not all charms fly
At the mere touch of cold philosophy?
There was an awful rainbow once in heaven:
We know her woof, her texture; she is given
In the dull catalogue of common things.
Philosophy will clip an AngelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s wings,
Conquer all mysteries by rule and line,
Empty the haunted air, and gnomed mineÃ¢â‚¬â€
Unweave a rainbow, as it erewhile made
The tender-personÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d Lamia melt into a shade.




The destruction of a snake-woman (sensuous enjoyment) by the cold stare of Apollonius, a philosopher, and the subsequent death of the Lamia's lover - the bbc production from 2010, an mp3@256.
